p.d: From a gravity-free flight to the aviation-lovers' rendezvous Outer space is everyone's dream. Today, the dream is within the reach of a privileged few, notably thanks to Virgin Galactic. A look at the Ducati, the legendary Italian motorbike. Luxury, performance, elegance and safety aboard the yacht "Swan". A detour to visit Ebace, the must-see aviation show. Directed by: Richard Haladjian (France, 2013)
